Commands.Grenade: 1-HIT AoE BRV attack.  Inflicts Small Defense Down for 3 turns and Small Speed Down for 4 turns on all enemies.  Grants Small Attack Up for 4 turns.
Commands.Shotgun: 1-HIT AoE BRV attack.  Inflicts Small Attack Down for 2 turns on all enemies.  Grants Small Max BRV Up to all party members for 3 turns.
Commands.Shotgun+: 1-HIT stronger version of Shotgun which also inflicts a single target HP attack.
Commands.Debuff Damage Up: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt to enemies afflicted with debuffs for 2 turns.  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Ragnarok Buster: 8-HIT BRV+HP attack.  BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV.  Grants Manly Charm for 8 turns.  Manly Charm raises Max BRV and raises BRV damage dealt based on the number of debuffs on the target(s).

Passives.High Tension: Slightly raises Attack for 3 turns when the battle starts.
Passives.Grenade Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Grenade.
Passives.BRV Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Shotgun Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Shotgun.
Passives.Grenade Charge: Increases the max uses of Grenade by 1.
Passives.Shotgun Charge: Increases the max uses of Shotgun by 1.
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Focus Attack: Raises BRV damage dealt to a single target with AoE attacks by 1.6
Passives.Natural Charisma: Slightly raises BRV damage when using an AoE.
Passives.Buff Boost&Speed Up: Slightly raises Max BRV and moderately raises Speed while buffed.
Passives.Grenade Extend: When using Grenade:- Increases the number of hits to 3.- Slightly raises its potency.- Slightly improves the effects of debuffs inflicted and extends their duration by 2 turns.- Raises party's BRV based on Max BRV.- Triggers an AoE HP attack after use (HP damage is split equally amongst all enemies).
Passives.Debuff Attack&Boost Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and Attack while buffed.
Passives.Shotgun Extend: When using Shotgun or Shotgun+:- Increases the number of hits to 2.- Tremendously raises its potency.- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120%.- Slightly improves buffs granted and debuffs inflicted and extends their duration by 2 turns.While buffed:- Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+.- BRV Attack+ has the following effects: + Increases the number of hits to 2. + Greatly raises its potency. + Low Action Delay.
Passives.Resonance of Destruction and Power: Raises party's Max BRV and Attack by 10%.
Passives.Debuff Damage Up Extend: When using Debuff Damage Up, adds the following effect:- Slightly raises party's Max BRV.

Weapons.Hellblau Gun CP: 15: Slightly raises all party members' Initial BRV and  Speed when Laguna's HP is over 50%.
Weapons.Leopard CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Ragnarok Buster.
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Increases the max uses of Debuff Damage Up by 1.Extends the duration of its effects by 2 turns.
Weapons.Regulus CP: 35: Turns Shotgun into Shotgun+, a stronger AoE BRV Attack which also inflicts an HP attack on the target.Increases the potency of Attack Down and extends its duration.Grants Small Physical Attack Up for 5 turns.
Weapons.Galbadian Machine Gun CP: 15: Increases the potency of Grenade.Extends the duration of Defense Down.
